Body: Possible Duplicate:  An app to locate my Android device around the house?  I'm looking for a "find my phone" app that can be activated from another app instead of a webpage. The scenario is simple, my wife misplaces her android phone frequently. I'd like to be able to quickly launch an app from my android phone or tablet and activate a find me siren on her device. So far all of the apps I've found require you to long into a bloated webpage first.Edit: It should work in reverse too, so I can find my tablet (which does not have a phone number of course) from her phone.
